game.name: Finger Party
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: FINGER PARTY is a short incremental game about plopping colorful blobs. Gain immense power and expose the dark secrets of a finger party.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FINGER PARTY is a short incremental game about plopping colorful blobs. Gain immense power and expose the dark secrets of a finger party.
